Recap for Halloween Grownup Event
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: MR4 Mayor's Cups: Recap for Halloween Grownup Event
By torey luvullo on Monday, November 1, 2004 - 04:17 pm:

The outcome was never in doubt - but there were still a few interesting happenings in the Halloween MR4 battle held on Sunday night.

Drole, the tiger, dominated. He beat Harvey, the plant, with 3 one-hit KOs. Harvey only got to try 2 attacks, both of which were blocked. Mr Grimm, the joker, didn't even do that much - one dodged death claw was all he could muster while being demolished 3-0, again by 3 one-hit KOs. Only Hilda, the Suzurin, was able to faze Drole, landing a do-mi-so in one match, and an aim boom in another. Still, as Linkin Park once so aptly sang, "in the end, it doesn't even matter" - 3 one-hit KOs again, 3-0 result. One of the one-hit KOs, a combo, was the first 999 damage yet in an MR4 event.

The rest of the night saw the lesser monsters beating each other up in a vain hope of finishing 2d. Alas! It was not to be; they split with each other, leaving each with a final record of 1-2. The most interesting battle in the bunch was round 2 of Harvey vs Mr Grimm. Harvey, down 0-1, landed a drain attack on the joker for 161. Mr Grimm reared back and landed a ferocious 999 death claw. KO!!...but wait...Harvey struggled up, with final guts, and took up the fighting stance once more. More amused than worried, the joker hit him again with another death claw - this time only doing 513 damage, but still more than enough...BUT WAIT...Harvey lived on...and. while the joker wondered what it took to slay this demon pumpkin, Harvey hit another drain, giving himself needed life, and depriving the joker of his. Mr Grimm never recovered from that humiliation, and Harvey went on to win 3-1.

By Infernus on Monday, November 1, 2004 - 04:28 pm:

Congrats to PT, who truly pwned our butts. Not very scary, but definitely gasp worthy.
